comment: Heavy accent that nobody could understand. His handwriting sucks, so being unable to hear or read leaves you kinda lost. He's nice though lol. He doesn't record his lectures.

His tests were the most important parts of the class, and they were very difficult. Most students get 50-70s on his test and he curves at the end of the quarter. His lectures are based on a reader that was created by another professor Enderle. He provides PowerPoints that usually do not follow his lectures.
Farahat does not care about his students. He gives no practice tests, has little to no resources for his students, and his lectures are very confusing. Be prepared to self teach yourself content.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Confusing lectures, TONS of reading for "pre lecture" (think like up to 100 pages sometimes), skips the practice problems he shows, and calls everything easy when i'm thinking why i can't solve it
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Very confusing, posted material late, not understandable. It is difficult to follow his train of thought and what he expects us to learn during the lecture.

Dr. Farahat is a really nice guy and you can see that he genuinely likes working with students and his fascination with chemistry. Dr. farahat is very understanding and really wants all his students to pass and will work with you to ensure you pass the course. If you have the opportunity to take him, you should with no doubt.

Dr Farahat is caring and makes a usually difficult subject understandable. KSU is really loosing a great professor by not keeping him. Labs are explained in great detail and the "why are we doing this anyway" part of lab was never there.

Literally such a caring professor and so helpful! Take him for lab if you can! He is super helpful and loves to help his students. He does have a strong accent but he understands that and will explain anything if you missed what he said.

Dr. Farahat is an easy A as long as you show up, do the labs and finish lab assignments. Make sure to study for the final to keep an A. He does give extra credit and will help you if you don't understand. Take him for an easy lab.

Dr. Farahat is the ONE TO TAKE for Organic Chemistry II. It will be in your benefit to show up to class !!! The course is difficult and dense but he does a fantastic job covering the material in a understandable way. IF you do what he recommends you will make an A or B. He cares about the students and tailors the class according to student needs.

Farahat is so AMAZING. He really wants you to learn and lectures a bit about the lab before you start one. He really cares about the students and does his best to help you succeed. Sometimes has his off days but doesn't affect your grade. Just do the labs and you'll be fine

One of the best professors I've ever taken at KSU. This was my second time taking this class, first time I had Dr.A and I almost had to take him again but last minute Dr. Farahat opened up and I took the chance, and I'm SO glad I did. I learned so much more and it was so much more simple to grasp the topic which is already super difficult for me.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: If you have the chance to take him in both lecture and lab, DO IT. Easiest A Ive ever gotten. In lab hes extremely laid back. Every now and then he checks notebooks but the procedures are usually short so Id do them just in case. Quizzes during 90% of the labs but theyre based on the practice questions that are posted on D2L. Also hilarious.

Amazing professor! I took him for Organic Chemistry I Lab. He makes things easy and easy to understand. Definitely take him is you have a chance cause he will make your life easier that semester as long as you do your work.
Loved the class and learned a lot.

Take this Organic Lab professor if you want your life to be easy. He is really intimidating at first but as the semester goes he tends to be softer. Labs are straightforward and follow his format and its a guaranteed A. However the quizzes arent easy and they are hard.
rating_tags: Respected--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Abdelbasset is AMAZING!He really cares about students progress in the class. He really wants you to know your stuff and will help you to do so. TBH I learned way more in his Orgo lab than I did in the lecture that I took from a different professor. Just do your work on time, re-read lab before the quiz and you will be fine. Take him :)
